name: vibbit-extension
description: Build tooling for the Vibbit Chrome extension

scripts.build:bookmarklet: npm run check:compat-core && npm --prefix apps/bookmarklet run build
scripts.build:bookmarklet:byok: npm run check:compat-core && npm --prefix apps/bookmarklet run build -- --enable-byok
scripts.package: npm run check:compat-core && npm run build && node scripts/package.mjs
